alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 4:06AM MST until January 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, with isolated amounts up to 15 inches possible. * WHERE...Central and Southern Laramie Range, Platte and Goshen Counties. This includes but is not limited to Glendo, Wheatland, Torrington, Chugwater, and Vedauwoo. The highest totals are expected over the central Laramie Range into eastern Platte County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Monday. The heaviest snow is expected overnight through Monday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and significantly reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County; South Laramie Range
